name: Beginner
shortDesc: Your max bucket size is 20 drops
longDesc: You can add 20 drops to your bucket and enter reswipe anytime.

name: Pro
shortDesc: Your max bucket size is 100 drops
longDesc: You can add 100 drops to your bucket and enter reswipe anytime.

name: Experienced
shortDesc: Your max bucket size is 50 drops
longDesc: You can add 50 drops to your bucket and enter reswipe anytime.

name: Legendary
longDesc: You can add infinte drops to your bucket and enter reswipe anytime.
